Banner.Description:
Welcome to my website! I’m a Full Stack Product Developer passionate about building innovative, user-centric solutions from the ground up. With expertise across both front-end and back-end development, I create seamless, scalable products that drive growth and enhance user experience.

I have 13 years of experience developing systems, interfaces, bots, and technological solutions to make the web a better place. I am dedicated to writing and refactoring clean, reusable, and scalable code in Angular and .NET Core, applying good practices and development standards.
AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In 13 years of experience I have covered many roles: Development Technical Lead, Senior Full Stack Software Engineer, Full Stack Developer, and Senior Technical Lead. I love contributing my knowledge to create new things that help solve problems.
My capabilities also include implementing system improvements, optimizing sites, standardizing patterns, and suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the project I am working on.
I also program things for my personal use, whether for hobby or utility.
Some of the technologies I have trained and worked with include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Senior Technical Lead
Description: Leader in technical decision making
Hiring technical talent for the company
Leading a team of 18 developers in a sprint based model for task management
Architected & developed cloud-based web application & API based services for KMS & HR management.Serving as technical lead for a 2 projects involving cloud automation with robust CI/CD

Designed and developed centralized core api for KMS using C#, .NET Core, ASP.NET Core, ASP.NET Web API (RESTful), PL/SQL, MSSQL, FluentValidation, Dapper, Microservices, Serilog, Ninject, AutoMapper, Azure DevOps.
Implemented Continuous Integration (CI) and Continuous Delivery using Github Actions AWS Elastic Beans, Docker.
Integrated with Different Payment and Subscription Services . ( Zoho Billings , Zoho CRM , Apple App store in app purchase , Play In app Purchase
Planning and reporting meetings.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Senior Software Developer
Description: I was part of a contracting team which was leading development teams through a few major & minor software releases across different legacy systems. All these releases were on almost schedule and within budget. This included managing a team of 4 .NET developers, testers, and business analysts both on local and offshore teams. Improved the running system with best practices & good design, and made sure high performance.

Functional programming in templates and plugins to add necessary monitoring features.Architected & designed using System using C#, .NET Core, ASP.NET Core, EF Core, ASP.NET Web API (RESTful), CQRS, Microservices, MSSQL Database, Redis, CQRS, Decorator Pattern, Onion Architecture, Serilog, AutoMapper, Angular, TypeScript
Implementation of continuous integration and daily backups.

Creation and maintenance of a CRM Platform made with Angular, Primeng, .NET, .NET Core API, MySQL, RxJS, Sass with configurable charts, alarm systems, and user management and general configuration settings.
Part of the project was to rewrite existing legacy application new API’s by using the latest tools and technologies provided with .NET Core

Experience.Jobs.Title: Frontend Developer
Description: Continuous improvements implementation, working on frontend and backend.
Creation of platforms with Angular, Angular Js , Python Django programmed with functional, reactive, and object-oriented programming paradigms.
Process automation with data structures.
Converting existing Angular JS app to Angular
Developing a HR enterprise time tracking software for freelancers and HR companies.
Designed and implemented a modern and intuitive user interface, resulting in 20% increase in user engagement and a 15% decrease in bounce rates.
Designed the overall architecture of angular Frontend application using Nx
Automated build and testing using docker and jenkins

Experience.Jobs.Title: Development Lead of Frontend Engineering
Description: Leading a team of 4 people in the development of a tourism data management platform made in Angular, Laravel, and MySQL.
Implementation of CI/CD in Azure. Refactoring and optimizing application load times.
Coding API requests with RxJS.
Creating modules with complex reactive forms.
Writing weekly reports about goals and plans.

PastRoles.Title: Senior Software Engineer
Description: Spearheaded a cross-functional team to design and implement a critical real-time messaging feature
30% increase in user engagement within three months of deployment.
Help rewriting a .NET MVC4 Project standalone to Distributed architecture using Angular , .NET Core , ASP.NET Web API
Coding API requests with RxJS.
Established a mentoring program for junior engineers, resulting in a 20% improvement in their coding skills and a 50% decrease in the time required toonboard new team members.
Writing weekly reports about goals and plans.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Senior Software Engineer
Description: Worked closely with other business analysts, development teams and infrastructure specialists to deliver high availability solutions for mission- critical applications
Had achieved the employee of the Year award in 2014
Lead a small team of developers to design develop and maintain mission critical projects
Contributed in delivering 10 major releases with high quality ratings by customer and fully automated CI/CD pipeline with automated Tests

PastRoles.Title: Software Engineer IOS
Description: Working closely with other developers leads to implementing solutions per requirement.
System Analysis and design for feature requirements
Developed a enterprise time tracking application for Legal domain enterprises
Coding in IOS
Established a mentoring program for junior engineers, resulting in a 20% improvement in their coding skills and a 50% decrease in the time required toonboard new team members.
Writing weekly reports about goals and plans.

FeatureProjects.Title: My Projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Highlighted Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: EINO - Software for your knowledge management
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: EINO: The app that effortlessly stores, digitizes and shares your company's important resources. No technical knowledge required, no costly servers or maintenance. It covers storing, collecting, and tracking knowledge, very extensive and complex with various functions made in Angular, SpringBoot, Machine Learning and Django. It works with websockets, schedules and calendars, Complex database jobs , integrations with Zoho Billing , Zoho CRM , Jira etc.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: CloudApper - Designer
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: CloudApper designer is a no-code interface which gives you the ability to design new web and mobile apps with drag and drop, made with Angular and .NET Core. The DevExtream library is applied.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: CloudApper - Dynamic App
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: No code app. It has an Custom workflows module, real-time notifications, Custom data capture and Reporting/span>, using dynamic vies. Developed in Angular and Laravel.

OtherProjects.Title: More Projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Hands Game
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Extended rock-paper-scissors game. A personal project developed in Angular where you play randomly against the machine. It features the use of services, interfaces, and components.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Countries Viewer
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Interface that consumes a countries API where you can view a list of countries, see details of each country, filter by name and region. It also has a dark mode to switch between dark and light themes.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Four Card Feature Section
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A single page with a minimalist design listing 4 features in 4 cards. Entry animations are used with Angular animations.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Social Proof Section
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Personal project of a page designed from a design made in Figma. Angular was used for development along with SASS and CSS GRID.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: FAQ Accordion Card
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Frequently asked questions accordion with logic and animations made in Angular.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Profile Card
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Simple design of a page featuring a profile card with basic information of a person.

Contact.Title: Say Hi!
Contact.Content: I will be glad to hear from you if you want to discuss new opportunities. Write to me, and I will respond as soon as I see your message.
